meta.title: Table d'Adrian – PharmD-led Private Chef Atelier
meta.description: PharmD-guided private chef experiences for UHNW households across Monaco, Miami, New York City, Dubai, London, Courchevel, Geneva, and worldwide.

hero.title: Table d'Adrian – PharmD-led Private Chef Atelier
hero.description: Chef Adrian and Dr. Antonia choreograph Michelin-level cuisine, clinical wellness, and cinematic service for villas, yachts, penthouses, and jets across the world's most discerning cities.

cards.title: PharmD Clinical Insight
paragraphs: Antonia, PharmD, translates physician directives, biomarker data, and longevity goals into indulgent cuisine that still respects glycemic balance, lipid panels, and circadian rest.
Every tasting arc is audited for allergens, supplementation timing, and hydration cadence before it ever reaches the pass.

cards.title: Chef-Patron Artistry
paragraphs: Adrian's Michelin heritage and Riviera sensibility turn seasonal terroir, Japanese precision, and Levantine warmth into poetic plates staged for UHNW salons.
He leads a multilingual brigade of sommeliers, butlers, florists, and mixologists who rehearse every cue until service feels effortless.

cards.title: Documented Luxury Logistics
paragraphs: We deliver menu books, mise charts, staffing scripts, and aftercare ledgers so households, estate managers, and captains maintain consistency across continents.
From Monaco villas to Palm Jumeirah penthouses, our atelier coordinates rentals, customs, security, and NDAs with calm precision.

included.title: What Every Engagement Includes
paragraphs: PharmD-led intake capturing labs, routines, medications, and guest sensibilities for every household member.
Culinary design spanning aperitif to digestif with curated wine or elixir pairings tailored to cellar profiles and provenance preferences.
White-glove service brigade, florals, linens, scent, sound, and documentation that leaves the residence composed by sunrise.

steps.title: 1. Discovery
steps.detail: Share residence, guest cadence, dietary objectives, and cultural nuances during a confidential consultation.

steps.title: 2. Design
steps.detail: Chef Adrian and Dr. Antonia co-author a tasting narrative, wellness protocols, and staffing plan for your destination.

steps.title: 3. Rehearsal
steps.detail: Our atelier secures sourcing, logistics, and rehearses service choreography with your household team.

steps.title: 4. Service
steps.detail: We execute, document, and reset the space while providing post-event recommendations for ongoing vitality.

pricing.title: Signature Tables

tiers.title: PharmD Wellness Tasting
tiers.description: Ten-course degustation balanced for longevity, immunity, and indulgence across iconic villas and penthouses.
paragraphs: Includes biomarker review, supplementation map, and post-service recommendations for household staff.

tiers.title: Grand Residence Dinner
tiers.description: Immersive Michelin-level dinner for 12–24 guests with sommeliers, floral design, and cinematic storytelling.
paragraphs: Ideal for Monaco villas, London townhouses, or Aspen chalets requiring multilingual, discreet service.

tiers.title: Superyacht Voyage
tiers.description: Chef and PharmD-led residency for charters spanning the Amalfi Coast, the Bahamas, or the Red Sea.
paragraphs: Provisioning, crew drills, and sunrise-to-midnight menus ensure guests feel indulgent and aligned at sea.

pricing.note: Investment adjusts for travel windows, staffing complexity, and concierge deliverables. Annual retainers available for multi-estate portfolios.

items.quote: Our Monaco villa dinner felt like a Michelin palace relocated home. Antonia translated our cardiologist's notes into absolute pleasure.
items.name: Family office host – Monaco

items.quote: During Art Basel Miami, Table d'Adrian handled back-to-back collectors' salons without a single detail slipping. Documentation was impeccable.
items.name: Gallery director – Miami

items.quote: The Riyadh to Courchevel jet rotation stayed on wellness protocol thanks to their PharmD playbook. Guests asked if the crew had tripled overnight.
items.name: Private aviation concierge – Riyadh

finalCta.title: Commission Table d'Adrian
finalCta.description: Only a handful of engagements are accepted each season to preserve artistry and intimacy. Share your intention and our atelier will reply within 24 hours.

meta.title: About Table d'Adrian
meta.description: Discover Chef Adrian's Michelin lineage and Dr. Antonia's PharmD expertise shaping private chef experiences for UHNW households worldwide.

hero.title: Chef Adrian & Dr. Antonia
hero.description: An EHL-trained chef and a PharmD clinical strategist combining fine dining heritage with evidence-based wellness to steward households across Monaco, Dubai, London, New York, and beyond.

cards.title: Michelin Heritage
paragraphs: Adrian honed his craft inside Michelin-starred brigades in Paris and Provence before forming a roaming atelier dedicated to intimate, cinematic dining.
His menus fold Riviera produce, Japanese technique, and Levantine spice into narratives crafted for collectors, royals, and family offices.

cards.title: PharmD Partnership
paragraphs: Antonia, PharmD, oversees clinical intake, integrates wellness protocols, and designs supplementation cadences that fit into luxurious dining arcs.
She liaises with physicians, performance coaches, and longevity clinics from Geneva to Los Angeles to ensure every course supports overall vitality.

cards.title: Boutique Global Network
paragraphs: Our atelier maintains relationships with sommeliers, perfumers, florists, and artisans across Monaco, Dubai, London, New York, and Singapore.
We deploy curated teams fluent in French, English, Arabic, Italian, and Romanian to mirror the sophistication of each residence.

included.title: How We Care for Households
paragraphs: Confidential dossiers storing preferences, rituals, medical considerations, and household protocols for effortless continuity.
PharmD-audited menu cycles, supplementation logs, and hydration strategies aligned to climate, altitude, and travel rhythm.
Chef-led sourcing relationships delivering caviar, wagyu, bluefin, and biodynamic produce with strict provenance documentation.

steps.title: 1. Alignment
steps.detail: We meet with principals, estate managers, and medical advisors to clarify objectives and non-negotiables.

steps.title: 2. Composition
steps.detail: Adrian sketches tasting journeys while Antonia scripts clinical guardrails, supplementation timing, and recovery rituals.

steps.title: 3. Production
steps.detail: Our atelier rehearses service, briefs crew, and stages logistics so residences, yachts, and jets feel choreographed.

steps.title: 4. Continuity
steps.detail: We archive documentation, update dossiers, and schedule follow-ups to maintain equilibrium across seasons.

pricing.title: Curated Programs

tiers.title: Household Profiling
tiers.description: Two-week immersion capturing culinary, wellness, and service standards for multi-estate families.
paragraphs: Includes PharmD intake, chef-led tastings, and a comprehensive household playbook.

tiers.title: Signature Ateliers
tiers.description: One-off statement dinners or tasting salons guided by Adrian with sommelier and floral direction.
paragraphs: Best suited for collectors' evenings, milestone celebrations, or diplomatic salons across Europe and the Middle East.

tiers.title: Ongoing Culinary Caretaker
tiers.description: Seasonal residency ensuring every property enjoys the same PharmD-informed cuisine and service doctrine.
paragraphs: Includes quarterly wellness reviews, cellar management, and staff refreshers across all estates.

pricing.note: Programs are bespoke to each family office or brand partner. Travel, staffing, and provisioning are estimated alongside your concierge team.

items.quote: Their dossiers rival the precision of our Geneva clinic yet the experience feels like pure indulgence.

meta.title: Luxury Private Chef Experiences
meta.description: Explore villa tastings, yacht residencies, private jet provisioning, and brand salons curated by Table d'Adrian with PharmD oversight.

hero.title: Experiences Tailored to Your World
hero.description: From Riviera tasting arcs to Middle Eastern wellness residencies, each experience is engineered to reflect your story, your rituals, and your guests.

cards.title: Villa Degustations
paragraphs: Multi-course narratives staged for Riviera villas, Manhattan penthouses, and Mayfair townhomes with sommeliers and florists in concert.
Each menu balances decadence and wellbeing through PharmD-calibrated pacing, hydration, and supplementation.

cards.title: Voyage Residencies
paragraphs: Extended engagements aboard Feadship, Lürssen, or Gulfstream fleets with breakfast-to-midnight service that adapts to shifting climates and time zones.
Crew training, provisioning matrices, and recovery snacks keep principals energised from Monaco to Muscat.

cards.title: Brand & Cultural Salons
paragraphs: Immersive dining for maisons, luxury developers, and cultural institutions launching collections or wooing top clients.
Story-driven dishes, signature cocktails, and integrated wellness touchpoints leave a lasting impression on guests and media alike.

included.title: Experience Scope
paragraphs: Menu architecture, beverage programming, scent, sound, floral, and lighting design that align with your brand or household identity.
PharmD-supervised wellness planning, supplementation timing, and contingency strategies for sensitivities or high-performance guests.
Concierge-level logistics: customs, port agents, villa staff briefings, NDAs, and aftercare documentation for every property.

steps.title: 1. Intent
steps.detail: We capture the story you want guests to feel, the rituals you cherish, and the standards your household upholds.

steps.title: 2. Blueprint
steps.detail: Adrian sketches flavour arcs while Antonia scripts wellness guardrails and we source artisans to match the moment.

steps.title: 3. Production
steps.detail: Our team arrives days ahead to rehearse, liaise with staff, and transform the space into your private restaurant.

steps.title: 4. Legacy
steps.detail: You receive a cinematic archive, service notes, and follow-up recommendations to extend the experience.

cards.title: Service Doctrine
paragraphs: Step-by-step service manuals covering tray holds, wine pours, language cues, and crisis responses for estate and yacht teams.
Illustrated diagrams, QR-coded videos, and multilingual glossaries keep every standard consistent across continents.

cards.title: Culinary Almanacs
paragraphs: Seasonal menu libraries with wine ladders, zero-proof pairings, and mise en place charts crafted by Chef Adrian.

cards.title: PharmD Protocols
paragraphs: Supplementation guides, lab tracking sheets, and recovery rituals curated by Antonia for principals, athletes, and young heirs.
Integrates seamlessly with concierge medicine teams from Geneva, Dubai, and Los Angeles.

included.title: Resource Deliverables
paragraphs: Editable PDFs, Notion workspaces, and laminated kitchen cards ready for estates, yachts, and jets.

cards.title: Residences & Villas
paragraphs: Reserve us for Riviera villas, Hamptons estates, Palm Jumeirah penthouses, or Swiss chalets seeking cinematic private dining.
We accommodate family celebrations, discreet investor dinners, and collectors' salons with equal care.

paragraphs: Charter brokers and aviation teams contact us to stabilise nutrition and elevate indulgence on itineraries spanning multiple time zones.

paragraphs: Physicians, sports directors, and wellness concierges rely on our PharmD intake to align cuisine with medical directives.

included.title: Details We Capture
paragraphs: Guest profiles, dietary frameworks, allergies, preferred ingredients, and cultural considerations for every attendee.

Checklist of documents we will prepare once you proceed with a consultation.

steps.title: 1. Configure
steps.detail: Enter location, guest count, service length, and desired enhancements.

steps.title: 2. Review
steps.detail: Receive an immediate range along with notes explaining variables such as travel class and staffing.

steps.title: 3. Refine
steps.detail: Save scenarios or share them with estate managers, captains, or planners for feedback.

steps.title: 4. Connect
steps.detail: Export your configuration to start a consultation—our team will validate and personalise the numbers.

pricing.title: Sample Configurations

tiers.title: Monaco Soirée
tiers.description: Twelve guests, Riviera villa, PharmD intake, sommeliers, and floral design.
paragraphs: Calculator output includes timeline for sourcing Mediterranean seafood and caviar.

tiers.title: Dubai Yacht Week
tiers.description: Five-day charter with sunrise wellness bars, sunset degustations, and midnight indulgence.
paragraphs: Includes crew drills and desert provisioning logistics.

tiers.title: New York Executive Retreat
tiers.description: Corporate leadership off-site with neuro-supportive menus, mixology, and cinematic dinners.
paragraphs: Calculator details meeting-room service upgrades and documentation deliverables.

pricing.note: Final investment depends on confirmed travel class, supplier availability, and requested enhancements.
